verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> Saul בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <WH4427> reigned וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> two שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and when he had reigned עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> over Israel

וַיִּבְחַר־ <WH977> chose ל֨וֹ שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> Saul שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> him three אֲלָפִים֮ <WH505> thousand מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> [men] of Israel וַיִּהְי֨וּ <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> were with שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> were with Saul אַלְפַּ֗יִם <WH505> [whereof] two thousand בְּמִכְמָשׂ֙ <WH4363> in Michmash וּבְהַ֣ר <WH2022> and in mount בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> Bethel וְאֶ֗לֶף <WH505> and a thousand הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> were with י֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3129> were with Jonathan בְּגִבְעַ֖ת <WH1390> in Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ין <WH1144> of Benjamin וְיֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> and the rest הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people שִׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> he sent אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <WH168> to his tent

וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> smote יוֹנָתָ֗ן <WH3129> And Jonathan אֵ֣ת <WH853> נְצִ֤יב <WH5333> the garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> of the Philistines אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that was בְּגֶ֔בַע <WH1387> that [was] in Geba וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> heard פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> and the Philistines וְשָׁאוּל֩ <WH7586> [of it] And Saul תָּקַ֨ע <WH8628> blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֤ר <WH7782> the trumpet בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> throughout all the land לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> hear הָעִבְרִֽים׃ <WH5680> Let the Hebrews

וְכָל־ <WH3605> All יִשְׂרָאֵ֞ל <WH3478> And all Israel שָׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> heard לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> say הִכָּ֤ה <WH5221> had smitten שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> [that] Saul אֶת־ <WH853> נְצִ֣יב <WH5333> a garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also נִבְאַשׁ <WH887> also was had in abomination יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and [that] Israel בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> with the Philistines וַיִּצָּעֲק֥וּ <WH6817> were called together הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> And the people אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> Saul הַגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <WH1537> to Gilgal

וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֞ים <WH6430> And the Philistines נֶאֶסְפ֣וּ ׀ <WH622> gathered themselves together לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> to fight עִם־ <WH5973> with יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> with Israel שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <WH7970> thirty אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> thousand רֶ֙כֶב֙ <WH7393> chariots וְשֵׁ֤שֶׁת <WH8337> and six אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand פָּרָשִׁ֔ים <WH6571> horsemen וְעָ֕ם <WH5971> and people כַּח֛וֹל <WH2344> as the sand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂפַֽת־ <WH8193> shore הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> which [is] on the sea לָרֹ֑ב <WH7230> in multitude וַֽיַּעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> and they came up וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְמִכְמָ֔שׂ <WH4363> in Michmash קִדְמַ֖ת <WH6926> eastward בֵּ֥ית אָֽוֶן׃ <WH1007> from Bethaven

וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> When the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel רָאוּ֙ <WH7200> saw כִּ֣י <WH3588> for צַר־ <WH6862> A strait ל֔וֹ כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִגַּ֖שׂ <WH5065> were distressed הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> (for the people וַיִּֽתְחַבְּא֣וּ <WH2244> did hide הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> ) then the people בַּמְּעָר֤וֹת <WH4631> themselves in caves וּבַֽחֲוָחִים֙ <WH2336> thickets וּבַסְּלָעִ֔ים <WH5553> and in rocks וּבַצְּרִחִ֖ים <WH6877> and in high places וּבַבֹּרֽוֹת׃ <WH953> and in pits

וְעִבְרִ֗ים <WH5680> And [some of] the Hebrews עָֽבְרוּ֙ <WH5674> went over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> to the land גָּ֖ד <WH1410> of Gad וְגִלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> and Gilead וְשָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> As for Saul עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <WH5750> he still בַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> he [was] yet in Gilgal וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and all the people חָרְד֥וּ <WH2729> him trembling אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> followed

[וַיִּיחֶל כ] (וַיֹּ֣וחֶל <WH3176> cause to ק) שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> days לַמּוֹעֵד֙ <WH4150> according to the set time אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> set שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> that Samuel וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not בָ֥א <WH935> came שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> [had appointed] but Samuel הַגִּלְגָּ֑ל <WH1537> not to Gilgal וַיָּ֥פֶץ <WH6327> were scattered הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and the people מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> And Saul הַגִּ֣שׁוּ <WH5066> Bring hither אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> a burnt offering וְהַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> to me and peace offerings וַיַּ֖עַל <WH5927> And he offered הָעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> the burnt offering

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כְּכַלֹּתוֹ֙ <WH3615> And it came to pass that as soon as he had made an end לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> of offering הָעֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> the burnt offering וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> behold Samuel בָּ֑א <WH935> came וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went out שָׁא֛וּל <WH7586> and Saul לִקְרָאת֖וֹ <WH7122> to meet לְבָרֲכֽוֹ׃ <WH1288> him that he might salute

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> And Samuel מֶ֣ה <WH4100> What עָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> What hast thou done וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֡וּל <WH7586> ? And Saul כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because רָאִיתִי֩ <WH7200> Because I saw כִֽי־ <WH3588> Because נָפַ֨ץ <WH5310> were scattered הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> that the people מֵעָלַ֗י <WH5921> and וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you לֹא־ <WH3808> did not בָ֙אתָ֙ <WH935> from me and [that] thou camest לְמוֹעֵ֣ד <WH4150> appointed הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> not within the days וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> and [that] the Philistines נֶאֱסָפִ֥ים <WH622> gathered themselves together מִכְמָֽשׂ׃ <WH4363> at Michmash

וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> Therefore said עַ֠תָּה <WH6258> Now יֵרְד֨וּ <WH3381> will come down פְלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <WH6430> I The Philistines אֵלַי֙ <WH413> against הַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> now upon me to Gilgal וּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> unto יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> have not חִלִּ֑יתִי <WH2470> and I have not made supplication וָֽאֶתְאַפַּ֔ק <WH662> I forced וָאַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> myself therefore and offered הָעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> a burnt offering ס

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <WH8050> And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> over שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> to Saul נִסְכָּ֑לְתָּ <WH5528> Thou hast done foolishly לֹ֣א <WH3808> have not שָׁמַ֗רְתָּ <WH8104> thou hast not kept אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוַ֞ת <WH4687> the commandment יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֔ךְ <WH6680> which he commanded כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now הֵכִ֨ין <WH3559> have established יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> thee for now would the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מַֽמְלַכְתְּךָ֛ <WH4467> thy kingdom אֶל־ <WH413> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> upon Israel עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now מַמְלַכְתְּךָ֣ <WH4467> But now thy kingdom לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תָק֑וּם <WH6965> shall not continue בִּקֵּשׁ֩ <WH1245> hath sought יְהוָ֨ה <WH3069> God ל֜וֹ אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> him a man כִּלְבָב֗וֹ <WH3824> after his own heart וַיְצַוֵּ֨הוּ <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֤ה <WH3069> God לְנָגִיד֙ <WH5057> him [to be] captain עַל־ <WH5921> over עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> over his people כִּ֚י <WH3588> because לֹ֣א <WH3808> have not שָׁמַ֔רְתָּ <WH8104> because thou hast not kept אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> what צִוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God פ

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> arose שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> And Samuel וַיַּ֛עַל <WH5927> and gat him up מִן־ <WH4480> from הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <WH1537> from Gilgal גִּבְעַ֣ת <WH1390> unto Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וַיִּפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> numbered שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> And Saul אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֙ <WH5971> the people הַנִּמְצְאִ֣ים <WH4672> [that were] present עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> about כְּשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> with him about six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וְשָׁא֞וּל <WH7586> And Saul וְיוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3129> and Jonathan בְּנ֗וֹ <WH1121> his son וְהָעָם֙ <WH5971> and the people הַנִּמְצָ֣א <WH4672> [that were] present עִמָּ֔ם <WH5973> them יֹשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> with them abode בְּגֶ֣בַע <WH1387> in Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> but the Philistines חָנ֥וּ <WH2583> encamped בְמִכְמָֽשׂ׃ <WH4363> in Michmash

וַיֵּצֵ֧א <WH3318> came out הַמַּשְׁחִ֛ית <WH7843> And the spoilers מִמַּחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> of the camp פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> of the Philistines שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> in three רָאשִׁ֑ים <WH7218> companies הָרֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> company אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> one יִפְנֶ֛ה <WH6437> turned אֶל־ <WH413> unto דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> unto the way עָפְרָ֖ה <WH6084> [that leadeth to] Ophrah אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> unto the land שׁוּעָֽל׃ <WH7777> of Shual

וְהָרֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> company אֶחָד֙ <WH259> And another יִפְנֶ֔ה <WH6437> turned דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the way בֵּ֣ית חֹר֑וֹן <WH1032> [to] Bethhoron וְהָרֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> company אֶחָ֤ד <WH259> and another יִפְנֶה֙ <WH6437> turned דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> [to] the way הַגְּב֔וּל <WH1366> of the border הַנִּשְׁקָ֛ף <WH8259> that looketh עַל־ <WH5921> and גֵּ֥י <WH1516> to the valley הַצְּבֹעִ֖ים <WH6650> of Zeboim הַמִּדְבָּֽרָה׃ <WH4057> toward the wilderness ס

וְחָרָשׁ֙ <WH2796> Now there was no smith לֹ֣א <WH3808> now no יִמָּצֵ֔א <WH4672> found בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for [אָמַר כ] (אָמְר֣וּ <WH559> answer ק) פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> for the Philistines פֶּ֚ן <WH6435> Otherwise יַעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> make הָעִבְרִ֔ים <WH5680> Lest the Hebrews חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> [them] swords א֥וֹ <WH176> or חֲנִֽית׃ <WH2595> or spears

וַיֵּרְד֥וּ <WH3381> went down כָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> But all the Israelites הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> to the Philistines לִ֠לְטוֹשׁ <WH3913> to sharpen אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man אֶת־ <WH853> מַחֲרַשְׁתּ֤וֹ <WH4282> his share וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֵתוֹ֙ <WH855> and his coulter וְאֶת־ <WH853> קַרְדֻּמּ֔וֹ <WH7134> and his axe וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> מַחֲרֵשָׁתֽוֹ׃ <WH4281> and his mattock

וְֽהָיְתָ֞ה <WH1961> become הַפְּצִ֣ירָה <WH6477> the charge פִ֗ים <WH6310> according לַמַּֽחֲרֵשֹׁת֙ <WH4281> for the mattocks וְלָ֣אֵתִ֔ים <WH855> and for the coulters וְלִשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three קִלְּשׁ֖וֹן <WH7053> fork וּלְהַקַּרְדֻּמִּ֑ים <WH7134> and for the axes וּלְהַצִּ֖יב <WH5324> and to sharpen הַדָּרְבָֽן׃ <WH1861> the goads

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> came בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> So it came to pass in the day מִלְחֶ֔מֶת <WH4421> of battle וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> neither נִמְצָ֜א <WH4672> found חֶ֤רֶב <WH2719> that there was neither sword וַחֲנִית֙ <WH2595> nor spear בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> in the hand כָּל־ <WH3605> of any הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of any of the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אֶת־ <WH854> with שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> that [were] with Saul וְאֶת־ <WH853> יוֹנָתָ֑ן <WH3129> and Jonathan וַתִּמָּצֵ֣א <WH4672> was there found לְשָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> but with Saul וּלְיוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3129> and with Jonathan בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> went out מַצַּ֣ב <WH4673> And the garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines אֶֽל־ <WH413> to מַעֲבַ֖ר <WH4569> to the passage מִכְמָֽשׂ׃ <WH4363> of Michmash ס
